pr_title: MINOR: change the log level from ERROR to DEBUG when failing to get plugin class loader

timeline.bodyText: I agree this should not be an error. Would debug be reasonable given the "Getting plugin class loader" message above?
timeline.author: hachikuji

timeline.message: MINOR: change the log level from ERROR to TRACE when failing to get plugin loader for connector
